ReturnPolicy.Description: When you receive the order, you will need to contact us via eBay Messages within (3) three days to state if you wish to return the item.  The item would then need to be shipped back by the Postal Service with online tracking and delivery confirmation and be received by us within (14) fourteen business days in the same condition as it was sent.  Once we receive the item back at our location we will inspect it and, if  in its original,unused and resalable condition, we will refund the price of the item. The shipping to you and from you would not be refunded, only the cost of the item. If we would not hear from you within (3) three days of receiving the item, we would consider the item satisfactory and as used.
